title: Miss
description: The boy she loved is gone. The man I've become doesn't deserve her.  Delilah Sage was my slice of peace. Pain filled in the rest. She kept me from sinking. I promised her forever. But our dreams never stood a chance. And I ruined the only good in my life.  The regret is suffocating. Constant and relentless. Trying to move on is pointless. My need for Delilah is stronger than ever. But her future is bright. And I’ll only drag her down.  If only this was that simple, right?  A job brings me back to our small town. The plan is to keep my distance. These scars are mine alone. But Delilah has always been my weakness. And resisting her isn’t an option.  After all, letting her go was never my intention.  MISS is a #BitterSweetHeat standalone novel.
author: Harloe Rae
